Package ohos.agp.text

Provides text tools.

This package processes text and manages the typeface and font style using text tools.

Since:
1
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RichText.TouchEventListener Deprecated.
    This change is effective since API version 8.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BidiAnalyzer
    Identifies the text direction based on the BidiStrategy specified by the user.
    BidiAnalyzer.BidiRun
    Stores the division of internal text directions of a section.
    CharInputFilter
    Implements a character filter, which supports filtering of plain text and RichText.
    DateFormat
    Provides a utility class to format the date text.
    Font
    Defines the font styles.
    Font.Builder
    Provides a builder to create a Font instance.
    FontFamily
    Provides a set of fonts (RawFont) of different styles to create Font.
    FontFamily.Builder
    Provides a builder to create a FontFamily instance.
    FontManager
    A class used to manage fonts in the system.
    InputFilter
    An abstract class that provides methods to filter the input text based on the specified criteria.
    InputFilter.Range
    Describes a text range where the index is greater than or equal to inStart and less than inEnd, as in other scenarios where text ranges are specified.
    Layout Deprecated.
    This change is effective since API version 8.
    LengthFilter
    Filters plain text or RichText by length.
    RawFont
    An abstraction of font files, used for creating a FontFamily.
    RawFont.Builder
    Provides a builder to create a RawFont instance.
    RichText
    Represents rich text in different formats.
    RichTextBuilder Deprecated.
    This change is effective since API version 8.
    RichTextLayout Deprecated.
    This change is effective since API version 8.
    SimpleTextLayout Deprecated.
    This change is effective since API version 8.
    TextForm Deprecated.
    This change is effective since API version 8.
    TextLayout
    A default implementation class for text layout, which supports both plain text and rich text.
    UpperCaseFilter
    Implements an uppercase character filter, which supports filtering of plain text and RichText.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BidiAnalyzer.BidiStrategy
    Enumerates the bidirectional text recognition strategies.
    TextLayout.CursorMoveDirection
    Enumerates the cursor movement directions.
    TextLayout.FontPaddingStrategy
    Enumerates the font padding strategies.
    TextLayout.HyphenationStrategy
    Enumerates the hyphenation strategies.
    TextLayout.JustifyStrategy
    Enumerates the text justification strategies.
    TextLayout.LineBreakStrategy
    Enumerates the line breaking strategies.
